fields.name: url
fields.label: Band URL
fields.description: Link to band's website or social media

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.description: Optional description of the gallery item

fields.name: category
fields.label: Category
fields.description: Category for organizing gallery items (e.g., events, activism, general)

fields.name: date
fields.label: Date
fields.description: Date when the image was taken or event occurred

fields.name: location
fields.label: Location
fields.description: Where the image was taken (venue, city, etc.)

fields.name: featured
fields.label: Featured
fields.description: Mark this as a featured gallery item

fields.name: role
fields.label: LTC Role
fields.description: Member's role in the band (e.g., Vocalist, Guitarist, Drummer, Bassist)

fields.name: order
fields.label: Display Order
fields.description: Order in which to display this member on the page (lower numbers appear first)

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
